lines: The essence of life is not in the great victories and grand failures, but in the simple joys. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf67320>
The joy of giving is the greatest joy of life. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf66ba0>
Happiness—not in another place, but this place... not for another hour, but for this hour. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf66420>
Joy is the kind of happiness that doesn’t depend on what happens. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf65de0>
If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf65520>
Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.  #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf625a0>
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf617e0>
When you start to develop your powers of empathy and imagination, the whole world opens up to you. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf611a0>
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf60660>
When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf712d0>
Practice like you’ve never won. Play like you’ve never lost. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf70c90>
Practice is the best of all instructors. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf7fa10>
Talent is a pursued interest. Anything that you’re willing to practice, you can do. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf7e9d0>
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is practice. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf7dc10>
Practice creates confidence. Confidence empowers you. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf7cbd0>
No one has ever become poor by giving. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf7c310>
The more generous we are, the more joyous we become. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf7b190>
Sometimes when we are generous in small, barely detectable ways it can change someone else's life forever. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf79750>
The greatest gift you ever give is your honest self. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf78490>
Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf77090>
The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf762d0>
As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf75650>
Showing gratitude is one of the simplest yet most powerful things humans can do for each other. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf74b10>
Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf744d0>
Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf73d50>
Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. Today is a gift. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf73850>
Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf72f90>
The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf726d0>
Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf71b90>
What counts can’t always be counted; what can be counted doesn’t always count. #<Author:0x00007fcdfaf71550>
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why. #<Author:0x00007fcdfbc4ed90>
It's not so much how busy you are, but why you are busy. #<Author:0x00007fcdfbc4e250>
The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away. #<Author:0x00007fcdfbc4d850>
